thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Australia's ANZ removes sales incentives for financial planning bonuses

title: Australia's ANZ removes sales incentives for financial planning bonuses
text:
May 7 (Reuters) - Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd said on Monday that it would remove sales incentives for financial planning bonuses, in a move that comes amid intense scrutiny of Australiaâ€™s financial sector.
The lender would also terminate the employment of financial planners who provide inappropriate advice, it said in a statement.
ANZ also committed to completing compensation on about 9,000 current cases where inappropriate advice occurred by the end of the year. (Reporting by Aaron Saldanha in Bengaluru)
